title: Ep. 20 They Ask Me What I Do And Who I Do It For
description:
In a world fueled by likes, followers and instant gratification we sometimes lose sight of what we really want in life and find ourselves living for others. But why? This episode we explore if and why we care so much what other people think. As usual, the ladies may surprise you.
